    • Cruise

      public Cruise(String name)
      Constructor for creating a Cruise object with the specified name.

  • Method Details

    • areDatesValid

      public boolean areDatesValid(LocalDate start, LocalDate end)
      Checks if the given start and end dates are valid for making a reservation on this cruise.
      Parameters:
      start - The start date of the reservation.
      end - The end date of the reservation.
      Returns:
      True if the dates are valid, false otherwise.

    • isRoomAvailable

      public Optional<Room> isRoomAvailable(Room.Quality quality, int numBeds, Room.BedType bedType, boolean isSmoking, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Checks if a room with specified characteristics is available for reservation during the given dates.
      Parameters:
      quality - The quality level of the room.
      numBeds - The number of beds in the room.
      bedType - The type of bed in the room.
      isSmoking - True if the room is smoking, false otherwise.
      startDate - The start date of the reservation.
      endDate - The end date of the reservation.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing an available room or empty if no room is available.

    • getAvailableRoomsList

      public ArrayList<Room> getAvailableRoomsList(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Retrieves a list of available rooms for reservations between the specified start and end dates.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date for reservations.
      endDate - The end date for reservations.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of available rooms.

    • printCruise

      public void printCruise()
      Test Function: Prints information about the cruise, including its name and details of each room.

    • addRoom

      public boolean addRoom(Room room)
      Adds a room to the cruise's database.
      Parameters:
      room - The room to be added.
      Returns:
      True if the room is successfully added, false otherwise.

    • modifyRoom

      public boolean modifyRoom(Room room)
      Modifies the details of an existing room in the cruise's database.
      Parameters:
      room - The modified room.
      Returns:
      True if the room is successfully modified, false otherwise.

    • getCruise

      public static Optional<Cruise> getCruise(String cruiseName)
      Retrieves a Cruise object from the database based on the provided cruise name.
      Parameters:
      cruiseName - The name of the cruise.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the Cruise object or empty if not found.

    • createTravelPath

      public void createTravelPath()
      Retrieves the travel path for the cruise from the database and populates the 'travelPath' list with Destination objects. The travel path is initially created with default values and updated with the actual database values.

    • updateTravelPath

      public void updateTravelPath()
      Updates the 'travelPath' list with actual values from the database, considering arrival dates and travel times.

    • saveTravelPath

      public void saveTravelPath()
      Saves the current 'travelPath' list to the database by updating the arrival dates of each destination.

    • printTravelPath

      public void printTravelPath()
      Test Function: Prints the travel path of the cruise, including destinations, departure, and arrival dates.

    • getTravelPath

      public ArrayList<Cruise.Destination> getTravelPath()
      Retrieves the current travel path of the cruise.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Destination objects representing the travel path.

    • getValidReservationDates

      public ArrayList<LocalDate> getValidReservationDates()
      Retrieves a list of valid reservation start dates based on the departure dates of the travel path destinations.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of LocalDate objects representing valid reservation start dates.
